contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Paris metro |Name=Louis Blanc |Pic=[[File:Metro de Paris - Ligne 7 - Louis Blanc 03.jpg|275px]] |Day=23 November |Year=1910 |Access= |Municipality=the 10th arrondissement of Paris |Zone=1 |Next= {{Paris Metro/next|7|Château-Landon|Stalingrad}} {{Paris Metro/next special|7bis|Terminus|[[Jaurès (Paris Metro)|Jaurès]]}} | X=164 | Y=37 }} '''Louis Blanc''' is a [[Metro station|station]] on [[Paris Métro Line 7|line 7]] and [[Paris Métro Line 7bis|7bis]] of the [[Paris Métro]]. The station was opened on 23 November 1910, 18 days after the opening of the first section of the line between [[Opéra (Paris Métro)|Opéra]] and [[Porte de la Villette (Paris Métro)|Porte de la Villette]] on 5 November 1910. On 18 January 1911 a new branch was opened from ''Louis Blanc'' to [[Pré Saint-Gervais (Paris Métro)|Pré Saint-Gervais]]. On 3 December 1967 the branch to ''Pré Saint-Gervais'' was separated as ''7bis'', terminating at this station. The station is named after the ''Rue Louis Blanc'', which honours [[Louis Blanc]] (1811–1882), who published political works, which led to the foundation of the [[Socialist Party (France)|French Socialist Party]]. He was a member of the [[French Second Republic|Provisional Government of 1848]]. He exiled himself to [[London]] during the [[Second French Empire|Second Empire]] from 1848 to 1870. He was elected to the [[French National Assembly]] in 1870. [[File:Metro de Paris - Ligne 7 - Plan Louis Blanc.jpg|thumb|left|500px|Plan of Louis Blanc station c.1905]] ==Gallery== <gallery widths="200px" heights="125px" perrow="2"> File:Lonely metro.jpg|[[Paris Métro Line 7|Line 7]] platform towards [[La Courneuve – 8 Mai 1945 (Paris Métro)|La Courneuve]] (right). The opposite platform is not in use. File:Rame-MF88-a-Louis-BLANC.jpg|[[Paris Métro Line 7|Line 7]] platform towards [[Mairie d'Ivry (Paris Métro)|Ivry]] or [[Villejuif – Louis Aragon (Paris Métro)|Villejuif]] (left) and [[Paris Métro Line 7bis|Line 7bis]] platform (right). File:Station-Louis-Blanc.jpg|[[MF 88]] rolling stock on Line 7bis to the right of an [[MF 77]] train on Line 7 File:Rame-MF88-portes-ouvertes.jpg|MF 88 rolling stock on Line 7bis at Louis Blanc File:MF 77 ligne 7 Louis Blanc.ogg|MF 77 rolling stock on Line 7 at Louis Blanc </gallery> {{commons category|Louis Blanc (Paris Metro)}} ==References== *Roland, Gérard (2003). ''Stations de métro. D’Abbesses à Wagram.'' Éditions Bonneton. {{Paris Metro/line 7}} {{Paris Metro/line 7bis}} {{coord|48.881137|N|2.364839|E|region:FR_type:landmark_scale:2000_source:frwiki|display=title|format=dms}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Louis Blanc (Paris Metro)}} [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1910]] {{Paris-metro-stub}}
